entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as 'the Dark Lord'.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who is strict and has a dark past.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as an extremely powerful wizard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Snape is associated with Voldemort, as indicated by the Dark Mark on his skin.
Harry mentions Dumbledore's name, showing respect for him.
